# The requirements for a ReadTheDocs build only. This file is a subset
# of the ``requirements.txt`` packages as required for documentation
# generation.
#
# This requirement subset works around the following problems:
#
# * ReadTheDocs build fails on pymongo because of an over-zealous
*   Eve dependency constraint.
#
bunch
Eve
Eve-Mongoengine
pytz
qiutil
qirest-client
